                  abs PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  da01              BGE      |L1.8|
000004  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
000006  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L1.8|
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
000008  4770              BX       lr
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  clr_scrn PROC
;;;18     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;19     void clr_scrn(void)
00000a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;20     {
;;;21     char i;
;;;22     for (i=0;i<LCD_SIZE;i++)
;;;23     	{
;;;24     	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
00000c  4aff              LDR      r2,|L1.1036|
00000e  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
                  |L1.16|
000010  5411              STRB     r1,[r2,r0]
000012  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;22
000014  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;22
000016  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8              ;22
000018  d3fa              BCC      |L1.16|
;;;25     	}
;;;26     }
00001a  4770              BX       lr
;;;27     
                          ENDP

                  find PROC
;;;28     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;29     char find(char xy)
00001c  4601              MOV      r1,r0
;;;30     {
;;;31     char i=0;
00001e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;32     do i++;
;;;33     while ((lcd_buffer[i]!=xy)&&(i<LCD_SIZE));
000020  4afa              LDR      r2,|L1.1036|
                  |L1.34|
000022  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;32
000024  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;32
000026  5c13              LDRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000028  428b              CMP      r3,r1
00002a  d001              BEQ      |L1.48|
00002c  28c8              CMP      r0,#0xc8
00002e  d3f8              BCC      |L1.34|

;;;34     //if(i==(LCD_SIZE)) i++;
;;;35     return i;
;;;36     }

;;;37

                  bin2bcd_int PROC
;;;39     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;40     void bin2bcd_int(unsigned int in)
000032  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;41     {
;;;42     
;;;43     char i=5;
;;;44     for(i=0;i<5;i++)

;;;45     	{
;;;46     	dig[i]=in%10;

;;;47     	in/=10;
;;;48     	}   
;;;49     }
00004e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;50     //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  bcd2lcd_zero PROC
;;;51     void bcd2lcd_zero(char sig)
000050  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;52     {
;;;53     char i;
;;;54     zero_on=1;
000052  4df0              LDR      r5,|L1.1044|
000054  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000056  7029              STRB     r1,[r5,#0]
;;;55     for (i=5;i>0;i--)
000058  2105              MOVS     r1,#5
;;;56     	{
;;;57     	if(zero_on&&(!dig[i-1])&&(i>sig))
;;;58     		{
;;;59     		dig[i-1]=0x20;
00005a  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
00005c  4bec              LDR      r3,|L1.1040|
00005e  2700              MOVS     r7,#0                 ;54
                  |L1.96|
000060  782a              LDRB     r2,[r5,#0]            ;57  ; zero_on
000062  b142              CBZ      r2,|L1.118|
000064  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1              ;57
000066  f8124c01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]           ;57
00006a  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.118|
00006c  4281              CMP      r1,r0                 ;57
00006e  d902              BLS      |L1.118|
000070  f8026c01          STRB     r6,[r2,#-1]
000074  e005              B        |L1.130|
                  |L1.118|
;;;60     		}
;;;61     	else
;;;62     		{
;;;63     		dig[i-1]=dig[i-1]+0x30;
000076  185a              ADDS     r2,r3,r1
000078  f8124d01          LDRB     r4,[r2,#-1]!
00007c  3430              ADDS     r4,r4,#0x30
00007e  7014              STRB     r4,[r2,#0]
;;;64     		zero_on=0;
000080  702f              STRB     r7,[r5,#0]
                  |L1.130|
000082  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1              ;55
000084  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;55
000086  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;55
000088  d1ea              BNE      |L1.96|
;;;65     		}	
;;;66     	}
;;;67     }             
00008a  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;68     
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd_mmm PROC
;;;151    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;152    void int2lcd_mmm(signed short in,char xy,char des)

;;;153    {

;;;154    signed char i;
;;;155    char n;

;;;158    char zero_on;

;;;170    	in/=10;

;;;171    	}   
;;;172    
;;;173    zero_on=1;

;;;174    simb_num=0;

0000ce  542e              STRB     r6,[r5,r0]
0000d0  e005              B        |L1.222|
                  |L1.210|
;;;181    	     }
;;;182    	else 
;;;183    	     {
;;;184    	     s[i]=s[i]+0x30;

;;;185    	     zero_on=0;
0000d8  2300              MOVS     r3,#0
;;;186    	     simb_num++;

0000dc  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.222|

0000e0  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;176
0000e2  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;176
0000e4  daeb              BGE      |L1.190|
;;;187    	     }
;;;188    	 }
;;;189    	          
;;;190    if(minus=='-')	
0000e6  2f2d              CMP      r7,#0x2d
0000e8  d103              BNE      |L1.242|
;;;191         {
;;;192         s[simb_num++]=minus;

0000ec  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
0000ee  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
0000f0  542f              STRB     r7,[r5,r0]

;;;193         }    
;;;194    if(des)

;;;195         {
;;;196         for(i=simb_num;i>des;i--)

;;;197              {
;;;198              s[i]=s[i-1];

000102  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;196
                  |L1.260|

000106  dcf7              BGT      |L1.248|
;;;199              }
;;;200         s[des]='.';
000108  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e

;;;201         simb_num++;     
00010c  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
00010e  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4

;;;202         }
;;;203    	
;;;204    n=find(xy);
000110  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000112  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;205    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)

;;;206    	{
;;;207         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];

00011a  e004              B        |L1.294|

00011e  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]

;;;208    	}
;;;209    }
00012a  bdfe              POP      {r1-r7,pc}
;;;210    
                          ENDP

                  long2lcd_mmm PROC

                  |L1.572|
;;;317              {
;;;318              s[i]=s[i-1];
00023c  183d              ADDS     r5,r7,r0
00023e  f8155c01          LDRB     r5,[r5,#-1]
000242  543d              STRB     r5,[r7,r0]
000244  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;316
000246  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;316
                  |L1.584|
000248  4298              CMP      r0,r3                 ;316
00024a  dcf7              BGT      |L1.572|
;;;319              }
;;;320         s[des]='.';
00024c  202e              MOVS     r0,#0x2e
00024e  54f8              STRB     r0,[r7,r3]
;;;321         simb_num++;     
000250  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
000252  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
                  |L1.596|
;;;322         }
;;;323    	
;;;324    n=(20*y)+x;
000254  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
000258  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
00025c  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;325    for (i=0;i<simb_num;i++)
00025e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;326    	{
;;;327         lcd_buffer[n-i]=s[i];
000260  4a6a              LDR      r2,|L1.1036|
000262  e004              B        |L1.622|
                  |L1.612|
000264  1a0d              SUBS     r5,r1,r0
000266  5c3b              LDRB     r3,[r7,r0]
000268  5553              STRB     r3,[r2,r5]
00026a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;325
00026c  b240              SXTB     r0,r0                 ;325
                  |L1.622|
00026e  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;325
000270  dbf8              BLT      |L1.612|
;;;328    	}
;;;329    
;;;330    
;;;331    
;;;332    }
000272  e8bd81fe          POP      {r1-r8,pc}
;;;333    
                          ENDP

                  int2lcdyx PROC
;;;334    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;335    void int2lcdyx(unsigned short in,char y,char x,char des)
000276  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;336    {
000278  460d              MOV      r5,r1
00027a  4616              MOV      r6,r2
00027c  461c              MOV      r4,r3
;;;337    char i;
;;;338    char n;
;;;339    bin2bcd_int(in);
00027e  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;340    bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
000282  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000284  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000286  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;341    i=(y*20)+x;
00028a  eb050085          ADD      r0,r5,r5,LSL #2
00028e  eb060080          ADD      r0,r6,r0,LSL #2
000292  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
;;;342    for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000294  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
;;;343    	{ 
;;;344    	if(n<des)
;;;345    		{
;;;346    		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000296  4b5e              LDR      r3,|L1.1040|
000298  4d5c              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
                  |L1.666|
00029a  42a0              CMP      r0,r4                 ;344
00029c  d201              BCS      |L1.674|
00029e  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
0002a0  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.674|
;;;347    		}   
;;;348    	if((n>=des)&&(dig[n]!=0x20))
0002a2  d306              BCC      |L1.690|
0002a4  5c1a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r0]
0002a6  2a20              CMP      r2,#0x20
0002a8  d003              BEQ      |L1.690|
;;;349    		{
;;;350    		if(!des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	
0002aa  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L1.704|
;;;351    		else lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
0002ac  186e              ADDS     r6,r5,r1
0002ae  f8062c01          STRB     r2,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.690|
;;;352       		}   
;;;353    	i--;	
0002b2  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
0002b4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
0002b6  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;342
0002b8  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;342
0002ba  2805              CMP      r0,#5                 ;342
0002bc  d3ed              BCC      |L1.666|
;;;354    	}
;;;355    }
0002be  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L1.704|
0002c0  546a              STRB     r2,[r5,r1]            ;350
0002c2  e7f6              B        |L1.690|
;;;356    
                          ENDP

                  sub_bgnd PROC
;;;1215   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1216   void sub_bgnd(char const *adr,char xy,signed char offset)
0002c4  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1217   {
0002c6  4604              MOV      r4,r0
0002c8  4608              MOV      r0,r1
0002ca  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;1218   char temp;
;;;1219   temp=find(xy);
0002cc  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1220   
;;;1221   //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;1222   if(temp!=255)
0002d0  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
0002d2  d009              BEQ      |L1.744|
;;;1223   while (*adr)
;;;1224   	{
;;;1225   	lcd_buffer[temp+offset]=*adr++;
0002d4  4a4d              LDR      r2,|L1.1036|
;;;1226   	temp++;
0002d6  e004              B        |L1.738|
                  |L1.728|
0002d8  1943              ADDS     r3,r0,r5              ;1225
0002da  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;1225
0002dc  54d1              STRB     r1,[r2,r3]            ;1225
0002de  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
0002e0  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.738|
0002e2  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;1223
0002e4  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;1223
0002e6  d1f7              BNE      |L1.728|
                  |L1.744|
;;;1227       	}
;;;1228   }
0002e8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1229   
                          ENDP

                  int2lcd PROC
;;;1021   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1022   void int2lcd(unsigned short in,char xy,char des)
0002ea  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1023   {
0002ec  460d              MOV      r5,r1
0002ee  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;1024   char i;
;;;1025   char n;
;;;1026   
;;;1027   bin2bcd_int(in);
0002f0  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
;;;1028   bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
0002f4  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
0002f6  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0002f8  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
;;;1029   i=find(xy);
0002fc  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0002fe  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1030   for (n=0;n<5;n++)
000302  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
;;;1031   	{
;;;1032      	if(!des&&(dig[n]!=' '))
000304  4a42              LDR      r2,|L1.1040|
;;;1033      		{
;;;1034      		lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];	 
000306  4d41              LDR      r5,|L1.1036|
                  |L1.776|
000308  b924              CBNZ     r4,|L1.788|
00030a  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]            ;1032
00030c  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20              ;1032
00030e  d001              BEQ      |L1.788|
000310  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
000312  e014              B        |L1.830|
                  |L1.788|
;;;1035      		}
;;;1036      	else 
;;;1037      		{
;;;1038      		if(n<des)lcd_buffer[i]=dig[n];
000314  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
000316  d202              BCS      |L1.798|
000318  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00031a  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
00031c  e00f              B        |L1.830|
                  |L1.798|
;;;1039      		else if (n==des)
00031e  d108              BNE      |L1.818|
;;;1040      			{
;;;1041      			lcd_buffer[i]='.';
000320  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
000324  542b              STRB     r3,[r5,r0]
;;;1042      			lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];
000326  eb050600          ADD      r6,r5,r0
00032a  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00032c  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
000330  e005              B        |L1.830|
                  |L1.818|
;;;1043      			} 
;;;1044      		else if ((n>des)&&(dig[n]!=' ')) lcd_buffer[i-1]=dig[n];   		
000332  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000334  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
000336  d002              BEQ      |L1.830|
000338  182e              ADDS     r6,r5,r0
00033a  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L1.830|
;;;1045      		}  
;;;1046   		
;;;1047   	i--;	
00033e  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000340  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000342  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;1030
000344  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;1030
000346  2905              CMP      r1,#5                 ;1030
000348  d3de              BCC      |L1.776|
;;;1048   	}
;;;1049   }
00034a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1050   //-----------------------------------------------
                          ENDP

                  ptr_carry PROC
;;;1238   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1239   char ptr_carry(signed int in,unsigned char modul,signed int carry)
00034c  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
;;;1240   {
;;;1241   signed int tempSI;
;;;1242   tempSI=in;                                                             
;;;1243   tempSI+=carry;
;;;1244   if(tempSI<0)tempSI+=modul;
00034e  2800              CMP      r0,#0
000350  da01              BGE      |L1.854|
000352  4408              ADD      r0,r0,r1
000354  e002              B        |L1.860|
                  |L1.854|
;;;1245   else if(tempSI>=modul)tempSI-=modul;
000356  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000358  db00              BLT      |L1.860|
00035a  1a40              SUBS     r0,r0,r1
                  |L1.860|
;;;1246   
;;;1247   return (char)tempSI;
00035c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
;;;1248   }
00035e  4770              BX       lr
;;;1249   
                          ENDP

                  event2ind PROC
;;;358    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;359    void event2ind(char num, char simbol)
000360  e92d4ffe          PUSH     {r1-r11,lr}
;;;360    {
000364  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000366  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;361    char iii;
;;;362    char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;363    unsigned int tempii;    
;;;364    		
;;;365    tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
000368  f44f6060          MOV      r0,#0xe00
00036c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_int
;;;366    tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));
000370  4262              RSBS     r2,r4,#0
000372  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
000374  f7fffffe          BL       ptr_carry
;;;367    tempii*=32;
000378  0140              LSLS     r0,r0,#5
;;;368    tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
00037a  f5006480          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;369         
;;;370    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
00037e  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
000380  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000382  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;371    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
000386  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000388  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
00038c  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;372    lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
000390  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000392  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
000396  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;373    
;;;374    iii=find(simbol);
00039a  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00039c  f7fffffe          BL       find
0003a0  4683              MOV      r11,r0
;;;375         
;;;376    if(dt[0]=='U')
0003a2  f89d0008          LDRB     r0,[sp,#8]
0003a6  2640              MOVS     r6,#0x40              ;366
;;;377        { 
;;;378        if(dt[2]=='R')
;;;379       		{
;;;380        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';
;;;381       		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ê';
;;;382        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='ë';
;;;383       		}
;;;384        	
;;;385    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;386    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';     		
;;;387       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;388       	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;389    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;390    
;;;391        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;392        	{
;;;393        	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
0003a8  2530              MOVS     r5,#0x30
;;;394         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
0003aa  2721              MOVS     r7,#0x21
0003ac  f8dfa068          LDR      r10,|L1.1048|
0003b0  f8df9058          LDR      r9,|L1.1036|
0003b4  2420              MOVS     r4,#0x20              ;385
;;;395         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;396         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;397         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;398         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;399         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;400         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
0003b6  f04f0823          MOV      r8,#0x23
0003ba  2855              CMP      r0,#0x55              ;376
0003bc  d042              BEQ      |L1.1092|
;;;401         	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;402         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;403         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;404         	}	                   
;;;405    	else      	
;;;406            {
;;;407     		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;408         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;409         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;410         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;411         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;412         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;413         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;414         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;415         	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;416         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;417         	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;418    		sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;419      		}	   
;;;420         }   
;;;421         
;;;422    else if(dt[0]=='P')
;;;423    	{
;;;424      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;425        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;426        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;427        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ï';
0003be  22cf              MOVS     r2,#0xcf
;;;428        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Ñ';
0003c0  21d1              MOVS     r1,#0xd1
0003c2  2850              CMP      r0,#0x50              ;422
0003c4  d07d              BEQ      |L1.1218|
;;;429    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;430        lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;431    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;432         	
;;;433        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;434         	{
;;;435             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;436         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;437        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;438        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;439        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;440         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;441         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;442         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;443             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;444         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;445         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;446         	}	                   
;;;447        	else      	
;;;448         	{
;;;449          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;450         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;451         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;452         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;453          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;454          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;455          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;456          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;457          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;458         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;459          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;460    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;461      		}     	
;;;462         }   
;;;463    
;;;464    else if(dt[0]=='Q')
;;;465    	{
;;;466      	lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;467        lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;468        lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;469        lcd_buffer[iii++]='U';
;;;470        lcd_buffer[iii++]='â';
0003c6  23e2              MOVS     r3,#0xe2
0003c8  2851              CMP      r0,#0x51              ;464
0003ca  d07b              BEQ      |L1.1220|
;;;471    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='û';
;;;472        lcd_buffer[iii++]='õ';
;;;473    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;474         	
;;;475        if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;476         	{
;;;477             	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;478         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;479        	    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;480        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;481        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;482         	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;483         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;484         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;485             	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;486         	int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;487         	int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;488         	}	                   
;;;489        	else      	
;;;490         	{
;;;491          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;492         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;493         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;494         	lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;495          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;496          	lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;497          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;498          	lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;499          	int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;500         	int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;501          	if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;502    	 	sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;503      		}     	
;;;504         }   
;;;505    
;;;506    else if(dt[0]=='B')
0003cc  2842              CMP      r0,#0x42
0003ce  d07a              BEQ      |L1.1222|
;;;507        	{
;;;508        	if(dt[2]=='C')
;;;509        		{
;;;510      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
;;;511        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Â';     		
;;;512        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='.';
;;;513        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='Á';
;;;514        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='à';
;;;515        		lcd_buffer[iii++]='ò';
;;;516    		if(dt[1]<9)
;;;517        			{
;;;518        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x31+dt[1];
;;;519        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;520        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;521        			}
;;;522        		else if((dt[1]>=9)&&(dt[1]<99))
;;;523        			{
;;;524        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)/10);
;;;525        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=0x30+((dt[1]+1)%10);
;;;526        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;527        			}
;;;528        		else 
;;;529        			{
;;;530        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;531        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' '; 
;;;532        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';    		
;;;533        			} 
;;;534        		//lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;535         	
;;;536        		if((dt_[0]==LPC_RTC->YEAR)&&(dt_[1]==LPC_RTC->MONTH)&&(dt_[2]==LPC_RTC->DOM))
;;;537        			{
;;;538        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;539       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;540        		    	lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
;;;541        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;542        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
;;;543       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=':';
;;;544       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;545       	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;546       	 	    	int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
;;;547       	 		int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
;;;548       	 		int2lcd(dt__[2],'#',0);    		     		
;;;549        			}	                   
;;;550        		else      	
;;;551        			{
;;;552        	 		lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;553        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;554        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
;;;555        	    		lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
;;;556        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;557        			lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
;;;558        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
;;;559        			lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
;;;560        			int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
;;;561        			int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
;;;562        	    		if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
;;;563    			sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0);  
;;;564        			}
;;;565        		}
;;;566    
;;;567        	if(dt[2]=='S')
;;;568        		{
;;;569      			lcd_buffer[iii++]='À';
