00101a  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;787
00101c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;787
00101e  f8097000          STRB     r7,[r9,r0]            ;787
001022  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;788
001024  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;788
001026  f8096001          STRB     r6,[r9,r1]            ;788
00102a  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;789
00102c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;789
00102e  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;789
001032  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;790
001034  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;790
001036  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;790
00103a  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;791
00103c  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;791
00103e  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;791
001042  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;792
001046  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;793
00104a  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;793
00104c  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21              ;793
00104e  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001052  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;795
001056  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;795
001058  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;795
00105a  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
00105e  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;796
001062  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;796
001064  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;796
001066  d302              BCC      |L1.4206|
001068  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;796
00106a  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;796
                  |L1.4206|
00106e  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;797
001072  488d              LDR      r0,|L1.4776|
001074  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;797
001076  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;797
00107a  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;797
00107c  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001080  e7c2              B        |L1.4104|
                  |L1.4226|
001082  23c0              MOVS     r3,#0xc0              ;806
001084  f10b0001          ADD      r0,r11,#1             ;806
001088  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;806
00108a  f809300b          STRB     r3,[r9,r11]           ;806
00108e  23c2              MOVS     r3,#0xc2              ;807
001090  f1000c01          ADD      r12,r0,#1             ;807
001094  f00c0cff          AND      r12,r12,#0xff         ;807
001098  f8093000          STRB     r3,[r9,r0]            ;807
00109c  232e              MOVS     r3,#0x2e              ;808
00109e  f10c0001          ADD      r0,r12,#1             ;808
0010a2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;808
0010a4  f809300c          STRB     r3,[r9,r12]           ;808
0010a8  f04f0cc1          MOV      r12,#0xc1             ;809
0010ac  1c43              ADDS     r3,r0,#1              ;809
0010ae  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3                 ;809
0010b0  f809c000          STRB     r12,[r9,r0]           ;809
0010b4  1c58              ADDS     r0,r3,#1              ;810
0010b6  f0000cff          AND      r12,r0,#0xff          ;810
0010ba  f8092003          STRB     r2,[r9,r3]            ;810
0010be  f10c0001          ADD      r0,r12,#1             ;811
0010c2  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;811
0010c4  f809100c          STRB     r1,[r9,r12]           ;811
0010c8  f89d2009          LDRB     r2,[sp,#9]            ;812
0010cc  2a09              CMP      r2,#9                 ;812
0010ce  d209              BCS      |L1.4324|
0010d0  3231              ADDS     r2,r2,#0x31           ;814
0010d2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;814
0010d4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;814
0010d6  f8092000          STRB     r2,[r9,r0]            ;814
0010da  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;815
0010dc  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0                 ;815
0010de  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;815
0010e2  e01e              B        |L1.4386|
                  |L1.4324|
0010e4  f1a20109          SUB      r1,r2,#9              ;817
0010e8  295a              CMP      r1,#0x5a              ;817
0010ea  d212              BCS      |L1.4370|
0010ec  1c52              ADDS     r2,r2,#1              ;819
0010ee  f04f0b0a          MOV      r11,#0xa              ;819
0010f2  fbb2f3fb          UDIV     r3,r2,r11             ;819
0010f6  f1030c30          ADD      r12,r3,#0x30          ;819
0010fa  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;819
0010fc  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;819
0010fe  f809c000          STRB     r12,[r9,r0]           ;819
001102  fb0b2013          MLS      r0,r11,r3,r2          ;820
001106  3030              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x30           ;820
001108  1c4a              ADDS     r2,r1,#1              ;820
00110a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;820
00110c  f8090001          STRB     r0,[r9,r1]            ;820
001110  e007              B        |L1.4386|
                  |L1.4370|
001112  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;824
001114  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;824
001116  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;824
00111a  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;825
00111c  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0                 ;825
00111e  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;825
                  |L1.4386|
001122  1c50              ADDS     r0,r2,#1              ;827
001124  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;827
001126  f8094002          STRB     r4,[r9,r2]            ;827
00112a  f89d1004          LDRB     r1,[sp,#4]            ;830
00112e  f8ba203c          LDRH     r2,[r10,#0x3c]        ;830
001132  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
001134  d13d              BNE      |L1.4530|
001136  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;830
00113a  f89a2038          LDRB     r2,[r10,#0x38]        ;830
00113e  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
001140  d137              BNE      |L1.4530|
001142  f89d1006          LDRB     r1,[sp,#6]            ;830
001146  f89a202c          LDRB     r2,[r10,#0x2c]        ;830
00114a  4291              CMP      r1,r2                 ;830
00114c  d131              BNE      |L1.4530|
00114e  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;832
001150  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;832
001152  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;832
001156  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;833
001158  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;833
00115a  f8097001          STRB     r7,[r9,r1]            ;833
00115e  223a              MOVS     r2,#0x3a              ;834
001160  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;834
001162  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;834
001164  f8092000          STRB     r2,[r9,r0]            ;834
001168  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;835
00116a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;835
00116c  f8095001          STRB     r5,[r9,r1]            ;835
001170  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;836
001172  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;836
001174  f8096000          STRB     r6,[r9,r0]            ;836
001178  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;837
00117a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;837
00117c  f8092001          STRB     r2,[r9,r1]            ;837
001180  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;838
001182  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;838
001184  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;838
001188  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;839
00118c  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]            ;840
001190  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;840
001192  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21              ;840
001194  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001198  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]            ;841
00119c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;841
00119e  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;841
0011a0  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
0011a4  f89d0002          LDRB     r0,[sp,#2]            ;842
0011a8  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;842
0011aa  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;842
0011ac  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
0011b0  e72a              B        |L1.4104|
                  |L1.4530|
0011b2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;846
0011b4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;846
0011b6  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;846
0011ba  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;847
0011bc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;847
0011be  f8095001          STRB     r5,[r9,r1]            ;847
0011c2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;848
0011c4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;848
0011c6  f8097000          STRB     r7,[r9,r0]            ;848
0011ca  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;849
0011cc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;849
0011ce  f8096001          STRB     r6,[r9,r1]            ;849
0011d2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;850
0011d4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;850
0011d6  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;850
0011da  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;851
0011dc  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;851
0011de  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;851
0011e2  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;852
0011e4  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;852
0011e6  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;852
0011ea  f8098001          STRB     r8,[r9,r1]            ;853
0011ee  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]            ;854
0011f2  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;854
0011f4  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21              ;854
0011f6  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
0011fa  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]            ;855
0011fe  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;855
001200  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23              ;855
001202  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
001206  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;856
00120a  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1              ;856
00120c  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc               ;856
00120e  d302              BCC      |L1.4630|
001210  2001              MOVS     r0,#1                 ;856
001212  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]            ;856
                  |L1.4630|
001216  f89d1005          LDRB     r1,[sp,#5]            ;857
00121a  4823              LDR      r0,|L1.4776|
00121c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0                 ;857
00121e  eb000081          ADD      r0,r0,r1,LSL #2       ;857
001222  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40              ;857
001224  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
001228  e6ee              B        |L1.4104|
                  |L1.4650|
00122a  f1a10209          SUB      r2,r1,#9              ;897
00122e  2a5a              CMP      r2,#0x5a              ;897
001230  d211              BCS      |L1.4694|
001232  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1              ;899
001234  260a              MOVS     r6,#0xa               ;899
001236  fbb1f3f6          UDIV     r3,r1,r6              ;899
00123a  f1030530          ADD      r5,r3,#0x30           ;899
00123e  1c42              ADDS     r2,r0,#1              ;899
001240  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2                 ;899
001242  f8095000          STRB     r5,[r9,r0]            ;899
001246  fb061113          MLS      r1,r6,r3,r1           ;900
00124a  3130              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x30           ;900
00124c  1c50              ADDS     r0,r2,#1              ;900
00124e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;900
001250  f8091002          STRB     r1,[r9,r2]            ;900
                  |L1.4692|
001254  e007              B        |L1.4710|
                  |L1.4694|
001256  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1              ;904
001258  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1                 ;904
00125a  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;904
00125e  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1              ;905
001260  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;905
001262  f8094001          STRB     r4,[r9,r1]            ;905
                  |L1.4710|
001266  f8094000          STRB     r4,[r9,r0]            ;907
00126a  e6cd              B        |L1.4104|
;;;910    
                          ENDP

                  community2lcd PROC
;;;911    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;912    void community2lcd(char* in,
00126c  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;913    			char xy,
;;;914    			char flash_pos,
;;;915    			char flash_on)
;;;916    {
00126e  4604              MOV      r4,r0
001270  4608              MOV      r0,r1
001272  4616              MOV      r6,r2
001274  461f              MOV      r7,r3
;;;917    char temp;
;;;918    char i;
;;;919    //char n;
;;;920    
;;;921    
;;;922    i=find(xy);
001276  f7fffffe          BL       find
00127a  4602              MOV      r2,r0
;;;923    
;;;924    //in1=192;
;;;925    
;;;926    //in2=34;
;;;927    
;;;928    
;;;929    
;;;930    temp=i;
00127c  4610              MOV      r0,r2
;;;931    
;;;932    //ptr_ram=&lcd_buffer[find(xy)];
;;;933    if(temp!=255)
;;;934    while (*in)
;;;935    	{
;;;936    	lcd_buffer[temp]=*in++;
00127e  4d0b              LDR      r5,|L1.4780|
001280  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff              ;933
001282  d104              BNE      |L1.4750|
001284  e006              B        |L1.4756|
                  |L1.4742|
001286  5429              STRB     r1,[r5,r0]
001288  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1
;;;937    	temp++;
00128a  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00128c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
                  |L1.4750|
00128e  7821              LDRB     r1,[r4,#0]            ;934
001290  2900              CMP      r1,#0                 ;934
001292  d1f8              BNE      |L1.4742|
                  |L1.4756|
;;;938        	}
;;;939    
;;;940    
;;;941    
;;;942    if((bFL2)&&(flash_on))
001294  4806              LDR      r0,|L1.4784|
001296  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]  ; bFL2
001298  2800              CMP      r0,#0
00129a  d004              BEQ      |L1.4774|
00129c  2f00              CMP      r7,#0
00129e  d002              BEQ      |L1.4774|
;;;943    	{
;;;944    	lcd_buffer[i+flash_pos]=95;
0012a0  205f              MOVS     r0,#0x5f
0012a2  1991              ADDS     r1,r2,r6
0012a4  5468              STRB     r0,[r5,r1]
                  |L1.4774|
;;;945    	}
;;;946    
;;;947    }
0012a6  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
                  |L1.4776|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                  |L1.4780|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.4784|
                          DCD      bFL2
                          ENDP

                  ip2lcd PROC
;;;949    //-----------------------------------------------
;;;950    void ip2lcd(	short in1,
0012b4  e92d4ff0          PUSH     {r4-r11,lr}
;;;951    			short in2,
;;;952    			short in3,
;;;953    			short in4,
;;;954    			char xy,
;;;955    			char flash_pos)
;;;956    {
0012b8  4607              MOV      r7,r0
0012ba  e9dd0509          LDRD     r0,r5,[sp,#0x24]
0012be  4688              MOV      r8,r1
0012c0  4691              MOV      r9,r2
0012c2  469a              MOV      r10,r3
;;;957    char i;
;;;958    //char n;
;;;959    
;;;960    //bin2bcd_int(in);
;;;961    //bcd2lcd_zero(des+1);
;;;962    i=find(xy);
0012c4  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;963    
;;;964    //in1=192;
;;;965    
;;;966    //in2=34;
;;;967    
;;;968    if((flash_pos==1)&&(bFL2))
0012c8  4bfd              LDR      r3,|L1.5824|
;;;969    	{
;;;970    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=' ';
0012ca  2120              MOVS     r1,#0x20
0012cc  4cfd              LDR      r4,|L1.5828|
;;;971    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=' ';
;;;972    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=' ';
;;;973    	}
;;;974    else 
;;;975    	{
;;;976    	lcd_buffer[i-12]=0x30+(in1%10);
0012ce  220a              MOVS     r2,#0xa
;;;977    	lcd_buffer[i-13]=0x30+(in1/10)%10;
;;;978    	lcd_buffer[i-14]=0x30+(in1/100);
0012d0  f04f0c64          MOV      r12,#0x64
0012d4  2d01              CMP      r5,#1                 ;968
0012d6  d108              BNE      |L1.4842|
0012d8  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]            ;968  ; bFL2
0012da  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.4842|
0012dc  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0              ;970
0012de  f1a6060e          SUB      r6,r6,#0xe            ;970
0012e2  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]            ;970
0012e4  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]            ;971
0012e6  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]            ;972
0012e8  e015              B        |L1.4886|
                  |L1.4842|
0012ea  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2             ;976
0012ee  fb027e1b          MLS      lr,r2,r11,r7          ;976
0012f2  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0              ;976
0012f4  f10e0e30          ADD      lr,lr,#0x30           ;976
0012f8  f806ec0c          STRB     lr,[r6,#-0xc]         ;976
0012fc  fb9bfef2          SDIV     lr,r11,r2             ;977
001300  fb02bb1e          MLS      r11,r2,lr,r11         ;977
001304  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30         ;977
001308  f806bc0d          STRB     r11,[r6,#-0xd]        ;977
00130c  fb97f7fc          SDIV     r7,r7,r12
001310  3730              ADDS     r7,r7,#0x30
001312  f8067c0e          STRB     r7,[r6,#-0xe]
                  |L1.4886|
;;;979    	}
;;;980    
;;;981    if((flash_pos==2)&&(bFL2))
001316  2d02              CMP      r5,#2
001318  d108              BNE      |L1.4908|
00131a  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
00131c  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.4908|
;;;982    	{
;;;983    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=' ';
00131e  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001320  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
001324  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;984    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=' ';
001326  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;985    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=' ';
001328  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00132a  e016              B        |L1.4954|
                  |L1.4908|
;;;986    	}
;;;987    else 
;;;988    	{
;;;989    	lcd_buffer[i-8]=0x30+(in2%10);
00132c  fb98f7f2          SDIV     r7,r8,r2
001330  fb028b17          MLS      r11,r2,r7,r8
001334  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001336  f1a6060a          SUB      r6,r6,#0xa
00133a  f10b0b30          ADD      r11,r11,#0x30
00133e  f886b002          STRB     r11,[r6,#2]
;;;990    	lcd_buffer[i-9]=0x30+(in2/10)%10;
001342  fb97fbf2          SDIV     r11,r7,r2
001346  fb02771b          MLS      r7,r2,r11,r7
00134a  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00134e  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;991    	lcd_buffer[i-10]=0x30+(in2/100);
001350  fb98f7fc          SDIV     r7,r8,r12
001354  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001358  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.4954|
;;;992    	}
;;;993    
;;;994    if((flash_pos==3)&&(bFL2))
00135a  2d03              CMP      r5,#3
00135c  d108              BNE      |L1.4976|
00135e  781e              LDRB     r6,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
001360  b136              CBZ      r6,|L1.4976|
;;;995    	{
;;;996    	lcd_buffer[i-4]=' ';
001362  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
001364  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
001368  70b1              STRB     r1,[r6,#2]
;;;997    	lcd_buffer[i-5]=' ';
00136a  7071              STRB     r1,[r6,#1]
;;;998    	lcd_buffer[i-6]=' ';
00136c  7031              STRB     r1,[r6,#0]
00136e  e016              B        |L1.5022|
                  |L1.4976|
;;;999    	}
;;;1000   else 
;;;1001   	{
;;;1002   	lcd_buffer[i-4]=0x30+in3%10;
001370  fb99f7f2          SDIV     r7,r9,r2
001374  fb029817          MLS      r8,r2,r7,r9
001378  1826              ADDS     r6,r4,r0
00137a  f1a60606          SUB      r6,r6,#6
00137e  f1080830          ADD      r8,r8,#0x30
001382  f8868002          STRB     r8,[r6,#2]
;;;1003   	lcd_buffer[i-5]=0x30+(in3/10)%10;
001386  fb97f8f2          SDIV     r8,r7,r2
00138a  fb027718          MLS      r7,r2,r8,r7
00138e  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
001392  7077              STRB     r7,[r6,#1]
;;;1004   	lcd_buffer[i-6]=0x30+(in3/100);
001394  fb99f7fc          SDIV     r7,r9,r12
001398  f1070730          ADD      r7,r7,#0x30
00139c  7037              STRB     r7,[r6,#0]
                  |L1.5022|
;;;1005   	}
;;;1006   
;;;1007   if((flash_pos==4)&&(bFL2))
00139e  2d04              CMP      r5,#4
0013a0  d109              BNE      |L1.5046|
0013a2  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]  ; bFL2
0013a4  b13b              CBZ      r3,|L1.5046|
;;;1008   	{
;;;1009   	lcd_buffer[i]=' ';
0013a6  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
;;;1010   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=' ';
0013a8  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4
0013aa  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2
0013ae  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1011   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=' ';
0013b0  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
                  |L1.5042|
;;;1012   	}
;;;1013   else 
;;;1014   	{
;;;1015   	lcd_buffer[i]=0x30+in4%10;
;;;1016   	lcd_buffer[i-1]=0x30+(in4/10)%10;
;;;1017   	lcd_buffer[i-2]=0x30+(in4/100);
;;;1018   	}
;;;1019   }
0013b2  e8bd8ff0          POP      {r4-r11,pc}
                  |L1.5046|
0013b6  fb9af1f2          SDIV     r1,r10,r2             ;1015
0013ba  fb02a311          MLS      r3,r2,r1,r10          ;1015
0013be  3330              ADDS     r3,r3,#0x30           ;1015
0013c0  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]            ;1015
0013c2  fb91f3f2          SDIV     r3,r1,r2              ;1016
0013c6  fb021113          MLS      r1,r2,r3,r1           ;1016
0013ca  4420              ADD      r0,r0,r4              ;1016
0013cc  f1a00002          SUB      r0,r0,#2              ;1016
0013d0  3130              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x30           ;1016
0013d2  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]            ;1016
0013d4  fb9af1fc          SDIV     r1,r10,r12            ;1017
0013d8  f1010130          ADD      r1,r1,#0x30           ;1017
0013dc  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]            ;1017
0013de  e7e8              B        |L1.5042|
;;;1020   
                          ENDP

                  long2lcdhyx PROC
;;;1050   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1051   void long2lcdhyx(unsigned long in,char y,char x)
0013e0  b517              PUSH     {r0-r2,r4,lr}
;;;1052   {
;;;1053   char i;
;;;1054   char n;
;;;1055   
;;;1056   i=(20*y)+x;
0013e2  eb010081          ADD      r0,r1,r1,LSL #2
0013e6  eb020080          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSL #2
0013ea  b2c2              UXTB     r2,r0
;;;1057   
;;;1058   n=*((char*)&in);
0013ec  f89d3000          LDRB     r3,[sp,#0]
;;;1059   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
0013f0  48b5              LDR      r0,|L1.5832|
0013f2  f003010f          AND      r1,r3,#0xf
0013f6  5c44              LDRB     r4,[r0,r1]
0013f8  49b2              LDR      r1,|L1.5828|
0013fa  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1060   i--;
0013fc  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
0013fe  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1061   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001400  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001404  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001406  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1062   i--;
001408  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
00140a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1063   
;;;1064   n=*(((char*)&in)+1);
00140c  f89d3001          LDRB     r3,[sp,#1]
;;;1065   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001410  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001414  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001416  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1066   i--;
001418  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
00141a  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1067   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
00141c  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
001420  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
001422  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1068   i--;
001424  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001426  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1069   
;;;1070   n=*(((char*)&in)+2);
001428  f89d3002          LDRB     r3,[sp,#2]
;;;1071   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
00142c  f003040f          AND      r4,r3,#0xf
001430  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
001432  548c              STRB     r4,[r1,r2]
;;;1072   i--;
001434  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001436  b2d2              UXTB     r2,r2
;;;1073   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001438  eb001313          ADD      r3,r0,r3,LSR #4
00143c  781b              LDRB     r3,[r3,#0]
00143e  548b              STRB     r3,[r1,r2]
;;;1074   i--;
001440  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
001442  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
;;;1075   
;;;1076   n=*(((char*)&in)+3);
001444  f89d2003          LDRB     r2,[sp,#3]
;;;1077   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n%16];
001448  f002040f          AND      r4,r2,#0xf
00144c  5d04              LDRB     r4,[r0,r4]
00144e  54cc              STRB     r4,[r1,r3]
;;;1078   i--;
001450  1e5b              SUBS     r3,r3,#1
001452  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
;;;1079   lcd_buffer[i]=ABCDEF[n/16];
001454  eb001012          ADD      r0,r0,r2,LSR #4
001458  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
00145a  54c8              STRB     r0,[r1,r3]
;;;1080   i--;
;;;1081   }
00145c  bd1e              POP      {r1-r4,pc}
;;;1082   
                          ENDP

                  pointer_set PROC
;;;1154   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1155   void pointer_set(char num_of_first_row)
00145e  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;1156   {
;;;1157   if(sub_ind==index_set)lcd_buffer[num_of_first_row*20]=1;
001460  499a              LDR      r1,|L1.5836|
001462  2401              MOVS     r4,#1
001464  4b97              LDR      r3,|L1.5828|
001466  f9912001          LDRSB    r2,[r1,#1]  ; a_ind
00146a  f9911004          LDRSB    r1,[r1,#4]  ; a_ind
00146e  428a              CMP      r2,r1
001470  d104              BNE      |L1.5244|
001472  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
001476  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]
;;;1158   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+1))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+1)*20]=1;
;;;1159   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+2))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+2)*20]=1;
;;;1160   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+3))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+3)*20]=1;
;;;1161   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+4))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+4)*20]=1;
;;;1162   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+5))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+5)*20]=1;
;;;1163   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+6))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+6)*20]=1;
;;;1164   else if(sub_ind==(index_set+7))lcd_buffer[(num_of_first_row+7)*20]=1;
;;;1165   }
00147a  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5244|
00147c  1c4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#1              ;1158
00147e  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1158
001480  d105              BNE      |L1.5262|
001482  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1158
001484  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1158
001488  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1158
00148c  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5262|
00148e  1c8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#2              ;1159
001490  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1159
001492  d105              BNE      |L1.5280|
001494  1c80              ADDS     r0,r0,#2              ;1159
001496  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1159
00149a  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1159
00149e  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5280|
0014a0  1ccd              ADDS     r5,r1,#3              ;1160
0014a2  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1160
0014a4  d105              BNE      |L1.5298|
0014a6  1cc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#3              ;1160
0014a8  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1160
0014ac  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1160
0014b0  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5298|
0014b2  1d0d              ADDS     r5,r1,#4              ;1161
0014b4  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1161
0014b6  d105              BNE      |L1.5316|
0014b8  1d00              ADDS     r0,r0,#4              ;1161
0014ba  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1161
0014be  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1161
0014c2  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5316|
0014c4  1d4d              ADDS     r5,r1,#5              ;1162
0014c6  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1162
0014c8  d105              BNE      |L1.5334|
0014ca  1d40              ADDS     r0,r0,#5              ;1162
0014cc  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1162
0014d0  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1162
0014d4  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5334|
0014d6  1d8d              ADDS     r5,r1,#6              ;1163
0014d8  42aa              CMP      r2,r5                 ;1163
0014da  d105              BNE      |L1.5352|
0014dc  1d80              ADDS     r0,r0,#6              ;1163
0014de  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1163
0014e2  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1163
                  |L1.5350|
0014e6  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
                  |L1.5352|
0014e8  1dc9              ADDS     r1,r1,#7              ;1164
0014ea  428a              CMP      r2,r1                 ;1164
0014ec  d1fb              BNE      |L1.5350|
0014ee  1dc0              ADDS     r0,r0,#7              ;1164
0014f0  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2       ;1164
0014f4  f8034020          STRB     r4,[r3,r0,LSL #2]     ;1164
0014f8  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;1166   
                          ENDP

                  tree_down PROC
;;;1168   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1169   void tree_down(signed char offset_ind,signed char offset_sub_ind)
0014fa  4b75              LDR      r3,|L1.5840|
;;;1170   {
;;;1171   ind_pointer--;
0014fc  881a              LDRH     r2,[r3,#0]  ; ind_pointer
0014fe  1e52              SUBS     r2,r2,#1
;;;1172   ind_pointer+=offset_ind;
001500  4410              ADD      r0,r0,r2
001502  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
001504  8018              STRH     r0,[r3,#0]
;;;1173   a_ind=b_ind[ind_pointer];
001506  4a73              LDR      r2,|L1.5844|
001508  eb000080          ADD      r0,r0,r0,LSL #2
00150c  4402              ADD      r2,r2,r0
00150e  486f              LDR      r0,|L1.5836|
001510  6813              LDR      r3,[r2,#0]
001512  6003              STR      r3,[r0,#0]  ; a_ind
001514  7912              LDRB     r2,[r2,#4]
001516  7102              STRB     r2,[r0,#4]
;;;1174   
;;;1175   sub_ind+=offset_sub_ind;
001518  7842              LDRB     r2,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
00151a  4411              ADD      r1,r1,r2
00151c  7041              STRB     r1,[r0,#1]
;;;1176   }
00151e  4770              BX       lr
;;;1177   
                          ENDP

                  tree_up PROC
;;;1178   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1179   void tree_up(char tind, char tsub_ind, char tindex_set, char tsub_ind1)
001520  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;1180   {
;;;1181   b_ind[ind_pointer++]=a_ind;
001522  4d6b              LDR      r5,|L1.5840|
001524  f9b54000          LDRSH    r4,[r5,#0]  ; ind_pointer
001528  1c66              ADDS     r6,r4,#1
00152a  802e              STRH     r6,[r5,#0]
00152c  4d69              LDR      r5,|L1.5844|
00152e  eb040484          ADD      r4,r4,r4,LSL #2
001532  4425              ADD      r5,r5,r4
001534  4c65              LDR      r4,|L1.5836|
001536  6826              LDR      r6,[r4,#0]  ; a_ind
001538  602e              STR      r6,[r5,#0]
00153a  7926              LDRB     r6,[r4,#4]  ; a_ind
00153c  712e              STRB     r6,[r5,#4]
;;;1182   ind=(i_enum)tind;
00153e  7020              STRB     r0,[r4,#0]
;;;1183   sub_ind=tsub_ind;
001540  7061              STRB     r1,[r4,#1]
;;;1184   index_set=tindex_set;
001542  7122              STRB     r2,[r4,#4]
;;;1185   sub_ind1=tsub_ind1;
001544  70a3              STRB     r3,[r4,#2]
;;;1186   }
001546  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;1187   
                          ENDP

                  bgnd_par PROC
;;;1188   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1189   void bgnd_par(char const *ptr0,char const *ptr1,char const *ptr2,char const *ptr3)
001548  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;1190   {
00154c  4680              MOV      r8,r0
00154e  460f              MOV      r7,r1
001550  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;1191   char i,*ptr_ram;
;;;1192   clr_scrn();
001552  f7fffffe          BL       clr_scrn
;;;1193   
;;;1194   ptr_ram=lcd_buffer;
001556  4c5b              LDR      r4,|L1.5828|
;;;1195   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
001558  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
                  |L1.5466|
;;;1196   	{
;;;1197   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr0++;
00155a  f8180b01          LDRB     r0,[r8],#1
00155e  f8040b01          STRB     r0,[r4],#1
001562  1c6d              ADDS     r5,r5,#1              ;1195
001564  b2ed              UXTB     r5,r5                 ;1195
001566  2d14              CMP      r5,#0x14              ;1195
001568  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5466|
;;;1198   	}
;;;1199   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00156a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.5484|
;;;1200   	{
;;;1201   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr1++;
00156c  f8171b01          LDRB     r1,[r7],#1
001570  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001574  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1199
001576  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1199
001578  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1199
00157a  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5484|
;;;1202   	}
;;;1203   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00157c  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.5502|
;;;1204   	{
;;;1205   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr2++;
00157e  f8161b01          LDRB     r1,[r6],#1
001582  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001586  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1203
001588  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1203
00158a  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1203
00158c  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5502|
;;;1206   	}
;;;1207   for(i=0;i<20;i++)
00158e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
                  |L1.5520|
;;;1208   	{
;;;1209   	*ptr_ram++=*ptr3++;
001590  f8131b01          LDRB     r1,[r3],#1
001594  f8041b01          STRB     r1,[r4],#1
001598  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1              ;1207
00159a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0                 ;1207
00159c  2814              CMP      r0,#0x14              ;1207
00159e  d3f7              BCC      |L1.5520|
;;;1210   	}
;;;1211   
;;;1212   
;;;1213   }
0015a0  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;1214   
                          ENDP

                  show_mess PROC
;;;1230   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1231   void show_mess(char* p1, char* p2, char* p3, char* p4,int m_sec)
0015a4  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;1232   {
0015a6  9c02              LDR      r4,[sp,#8]
;;;1233   bgnd_par(p1,p2,p3,p4);
0015a8  f7fffffe          BL       bgnd_par
;;;1234   tree_up(iSM,sub_ind,sub_ind1,sub_ind2);
0015ac  4847              LDR      r0,|L1.5836|
0015ae  78c3              LDRB     r3,[r0,#3]  ; a_ind
0015b0  7882              LDRB     r2,[r0,#2]  ; a_ind
0015b2  7841              LDRB     r1,[r0,#1]  ; a_ind
0015b4  20aa              MOVS     r0,#0xaa
0015b6  f7fffffe          BL       tree_up
;;;1235   ret((char)(m_sec/100));
0015ba  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
0015bc  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
0015c0  e8bd4010          POP      {r4,lr}
0015c4  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
0015c6  f7ffbffe          B.W      ||ret||
;;;1236   }
;;;1237   
                          ENDP

                  event_data2ind PROC
;;;1250   //-----------------------------------------------
;;;1251   void event_data2ind(char num, char simbol)
0015ca  e92d43fe          PUSH     {r1-r9,lr}
;;;1252   {
0015ce  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;1253   char iii;
;;;1254   char dt[4],dt_[4],dt__[4];
;;;1255   unsigned int tempii;    
;;;1256   		
;;;1257   /*tempii=lc640_read_int(PTR_EVENT_LOG);
;;;1258   tempii=ptr_carry(tempii,64,-1*((signed)num));*/
;;;1259   tempii=(signed)num;
;;;1260   tempii*=32;
0015d0  0140              LSLS     r0,r0,#5
;;;1261   tempii+=EVENT_LOG;
0015d2  f5006480          ADD      r4,r0,#0x400
;;;1262        
;;;1263   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii,dt);
0015d6  a902              ADD      r1,sp,#8
0015d8  4620              MOV      r0,r4
0015da  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1264   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+8,dt_);
0015de  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
0015e0  f1040008          ADD      r0,r4,#8
0015e4  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1265   lc640_read_long_ptr(tempii+12,dt__);
0015e8  4669              MOV      r1,sp
0015ea  f104000c          ADD      r0,r4,#0xc
0015ee  f7fffffe          BL       lc640_read_long_ptr
;;;1266   
;;;1267   iii=find(simbol);
0015f2  4628              MOV      r0,r5
0015f4  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;1268   
;;;1269   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0015f8  2620              MOVS     r6,#0x20
0015fa  4c32              LDR      r4,|L1.5828|
0015fc  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
0015fe  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001600  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1270   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001602  2730              MOVS     r7,#0x30
001604  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001606  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001608  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1271   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
00160a  f04f0821          MOV      r8,#0x21
00160e  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001610  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001612  f8048000          STRB     r8,[r4,r0]
;;;1272   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@'; 
001616  f04f0940          MOV      r9,#0x40
00161a  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
00161c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00161e  f8049001          STRB     r9,[r4,r1]
;;;1273   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001622  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001624  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001626  5426              STRB     r6,[r4,r0]
;;;1274   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
001628  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
00162a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00162c  5466              STRB     r6,[r4,r1]
;;;1275   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00162e  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
001630  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001632  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1276   lcd_buffer[iii++]='#';
001634  2223              MOVS     r2,#0x23
001636  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001638  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
00163a  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
;;;1277   int2lcd(dt_[2],'!',0);
00163c  f89d0006          LDRB     r0,[sp,#6]
001640  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
001642  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21
001644  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1278   int2lcd(dt_[0],'#',0);   
001648  f89d0004          LDRB     r0,[sp,#4]
00164c  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
00164e  2123              MOVS     r1,#0x23
001650  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1279   if(!((dt_[1]>=1)&&(dt_[1]<=12)))dt_[1]=1;
001654  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001658  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00165a  280c              CMP      r0,#0xc
00165c  d302              BCC      |L1.5732|
00165e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
001660  f88d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,#5]
                  |L1.5732|
;;;1280   sub_bgnd(sm_mont[dt_[1]],'@',0); 
001664  f89d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,#5]
001668  491b              LDR      r1,|L1.5848|
00166a  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
00166c  eb010080          ADD      r0,r1,r0,LSL #2
001670  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
001672  f7fffffe          BL       sub_bgnd
;;;1281   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';		
001676  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
001678  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00167a  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1282   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
00167c  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00167e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001680  5427              STRB     r7,[r4,r0]
;;;1283   lcd_buffer[iii++]='!';
001682  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001684  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001686  f8048001          STRB     r8,[r4,r1]
;;;1284   lcd_buffer[iii++]=':'; 
00168a  223a              MOVS     r2,#0x3a
00168c  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00168e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
001690  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
;;;1285   lcd_buffer[iii++]='0';
001692  1c48              ADDS     r0,r1,#1
001694  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
001696  5467              STRB     r7,[r4,r1]
;;;1286   lcd_buffer[iii++]='@';
001698  1c41              ADDS     r1,r0,#1
00169a  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1
00169c  f8049000          STRB     r9,[r4,r0]
;;;1287   int2lcd(dt__[0],'!',0);
0016a0  f89d0000          LDRB     r0,[sp,#0]
0016a4  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0016a6  2121              MOVS     r1,#0x21
0016a8  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1288   int2lcd(dt__[1],'@',0);
0016ac  f89d0001          LDRB     r0,[sp,#1]
0016b0  2200              MOVS     r2,#0
0016b2  2140              MOVS     r1,#0x40
0016b4  f7fffffe          BL       int2lcd
;;;1289      		     		
;;;1290   lcd_buffer[iii++]=' ';
0016b8  5566              STRB     r6,[r4,r5]
;;;1291   }	
0016ba  e8bd83fe          POP      {r1-r9,pc}
0016be  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L1.5824|
                          DCD      bFL2
                  |L1.5828|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
                  |L1.5832|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L1.5836|
                          DCD      a_ind
                  |L1.5840|
                          DCD      ind_pointer
                  |L1.5844|
                          DCD      b_ind
                  |L1.5848|
                          DCD      sm_mont
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||area_number.2||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.2||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_m PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460d              MOV      r5,r1
000004  4614              MOV      r4,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
000008  da02              BGE      |L2.16|
00000a  43c0              MVNS     r0,r0
00000c  1c40              ADDS     r0,r0,#1
00000e  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L2.16|
000010  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000014  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000016  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000018  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
00001c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       find
000022  28ff              CMP      r0,#0xff
000024  d01e              BEQ      |L2.100|
000026  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000028  4d10              LDR      r5,|L2.108|
00002a  4a11              LDR      r2,|L2.112|
                  |L2.44|
00002c  42a1              CMP      r1,r4
00002e  d202              BCS      |L2.54|
000030  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000032  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000034  e010              B        |L2.88|
                  |L2.54|
000036  d108              BNE      |L2.74|
000038  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
00003c  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
00003e  eb020600          ADD      r6,r2,r0
000042  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
000044  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
000048  e006              B        |L2.88|
                  |L2.74|
00004a  5c6b              LDRB     r3,[r5,r1]
00004c  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
00004e  d003              BEQ      |L2.88|
000050  b14c              CBZ      r4,|L2.102|
000052  1816              ADDS     r6,r2,r0
000054  f8063c01          STRB     r3,[r6,#-1]
                  |L2.88|
000058  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
00005a  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00005c  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
00005e  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
000060  2905              CMP      r1,#5
000062  d3e3              BCC      |L2.44|
                  |L2.100|
000064  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
                  |L2.102|
000066  5413              STRB     r3,[r2,r0]
000068  e7f6              B        |L2.88|
;;;17     
                          ENDP

00006a  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L2.108|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L2.112|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.3||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.3||, ||.text||
                  int2lcd_mm PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b5f0              PUSH     {r4-r7,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000004  4615              MOV      r5,r2
000006  2800              CMP      r0,#0
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
000008  da01              BGE      |L3.14|
00000a  4240              RSBS     r0,r0,#0
00000c  b200              SXTH     r0,r0
                  |L3.14|
00000e  262d              MOVS     r6,#0x2d
000010  f7fffffe          BL       bin2bcd_int
000014  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
000016  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000018  f7fffffe          BL       bcd2lcd_zero
00001c  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       find
000022  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000024  4a17              LDR      r2,|L3.132|
000026  4c18              LDR      r4,|L3.136|
                  |L3.40|
000028  b97d              CBNZ     r5,|L3.74|
00002a  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00002c  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
00002e  d00c              BEQ      |L3.74|
000030  1857              ADDS     r7,r2,r1
000032  787f              LDRB     r7,[r7,#1]
000034  2f20              CMP      r7,#0x20
000036  d106              BNE      |L3.70|
000038  2e2d              CMP      r6,#0x2d
00003a  d104              BNE      |L3.70|
00003c  eb040c00          ADD      r12,r4,r0
000040  272d              MOVS     r7,#0x2d
000042  f80c7c01          STRB     r7,[r12,#-1]
                  |L3.70|
000046  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000048  e014              B        |L3.116|
                  |L3.74|
00004a  42a9              CMP      r1,r5
00004c  d202              BCS      |L3.84|
00004e  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000050  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
000052  e00f              B        |L3.116|
                  |L3.84|
000054  d108              BNE      |L3.104|
000056  f04f032e          MOV      r3,#0x2e
00005a  5423              STRB     r3,[r4,r0]
00005c  eb040700          ADD      r7,r4,r0
000060  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000062  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
000066  e005              B        |L3.116|
                  |L3.104|
000068  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
00006a  2b20              CMP      r3,#0x20
00006c  d002              BEQ      |L3.116|
00006e  1827              ADDS     r7,r4,r0
000070  f8073c01          STRB     r3,[r7,#-1]
                  |L3.116|
000074  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000076  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000078  1c49              ADDS     r1,r1,#1
00007a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00007c  2905              CMP      r1,#5
00007e  d3d3              BCC      |L3.40|
000080  bdf0              POP      {r4-r7,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000082  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L3.132|
                          DCD      ||dig||
                  |L3.136|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.4||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.4||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdh PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000006  f7fffffe          BL       find
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  4a06              LDR      r2,|L4.36|
00000c  f004010f          AND      r1,r4,#0xf
000010  5c53              LDRB     r3,[r2,r1]
000012  4905              LDR      r1,|L4.40|
000014  540b              STRB     r3,[r1,r0]
000016  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000018  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001a  eb021214          ADD      r2,r2,r4,LSR #4
00001e  7812              LDRB     r2,[r2,#0]
000020  540a              STRB     r2,[r1,r0]
000022  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L4.36|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L4.40|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.5||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4a06              LDR      r2,|L5.40|
00000e  f000030f          AND      r3,r0,#0xf
000012  5cd4              LDRB     r4,[r2,r3]
000014  4b05              LDR      r3,|L5.44|
000016  545c              STRB     r4,[r3,r1]
000018  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
00001a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001c  eb021010          ADD      r0,r2,r0,LSR #4
000020  7800              LDRB     r0,[r0,#0]
000022  5458              STRB     r0,[r3,r1]
000024  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

000026  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L5.40|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L5.44|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.6||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.6||, ||.text||
                  int2lcdhyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00000c  4b0c              LDR      r3,|L6.64|
00000e  f000020f          AND      r2,r0,#0xf
000012  4c0c              LDR      r4,|L6.68|
000014  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000016  5462              STRB     r2,[r4,r1]
000018  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
00001a  b2c9              UXTB     r1,r1
00001c  0902              LSRS     r2,r0,#4
00001e  f002000f          AND      r0,r2,#0xf
000022  5c18              LDRB     r0,[r3,r0]
000024  5460              STRB     r0,[r4,r1]
000026  1e49              SUBS     r1,r1,#1
000028  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00002a  0911              LSRS     r1,r2,#4
00002c  f001020f          AND      r2,r1,#0xf
000030  5c9a              LDRB     r2,[r3,r2]
000032  5422              STRB     r2,[r4,r0]
000034  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
000036  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000038  0909              LSRS     r1,r1,#4
00003a  5c59              LDRB     r1,[r3,r1]
00003c  5421              STRB     r1,[r4,r0]
00003e  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L6.64|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L6.68|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer

                          AREA ||area_number.7||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                          EXPORTAS ||area_number.7||, ||.text||
                  char2lcdbyx PROC
;;;11     //-----------------------------------------------
;;;12     signed short abs(signed short in)
000000  b530              PUSH     {r4,r5,lr}
;;;13     {
;;;14     if(in<0)in=-in;
000002  eb010181          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #2
000006  eb020181          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #2
;;;15     return in;
;;;16     }
00000a  b2cc              UXTB     r4,r1
00000c  491a              LDR      r1,|L7.120|
00000e  f0000201          AND      r2,r0,#1
000012  5c8d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r2]
000014  1e62              SUBS     r2,r4,#1
000016  b2d3              UXTB     r3,r2
000018  4a18              LDR      r2,|L7.124|
00001a  5515              STRB     r5,[r2,r4]
00001c  0844              LSRS     r4,r0,#1
00001e  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
000022  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000024  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
000026  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000028  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
00002a  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
00002c  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
000030  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
000032  1e43              SUBS     r3,r0,#1
000034  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000036  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000038  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
00003a  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00003e  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
000040  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
000042  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000044  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000046  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
000048  f0040301          AND      r3,r4,#1
00004c  5ccd              LDRB     r5,[r1,r3]
00004e  1e43              SUBS     r3,r0,#1
000050  b2db              UXTB     r3,r3
000052  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000054  0864              LSRS     r4,r4,#1
000056  f0040001          AND      r0,r4,#1
00005a  5c0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r0]
00005c  1e58              SUBS     r0,r3,#1
00005e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000060  54d5              STRB     r5,[r2,r3]
000062  0863              LSRS     r3,r4,#1
000064  f0030401          AND      r4,r3,#1
000068  5d0d              LDRB     r5,[r1,r4]
00006a  1e44              SUBS     r4,r0,#1
00006c  b2e4              UXTB     r4,r4
00006e  5415              STRB     r5,[r2,r0]
000070  0858              LSRS     r0,r3,#1
000072  5c08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r0]
000074  5510              STRB     r0,[r2,r4]
000076  bd30              POP      {r4,r5,pc}
;;;17     
                          ENDP

                  |L7.120|
                          DCD      ABCDEF
                  |L7.124|
                          DCD      lcd_buffer
